definition: to redeem a vow (to a deity)/to fulfill a promise/votive

sentences.english: We are also willing to increase exchanges and cooperation with African countries to jointly fend off financial risks.

sentences.english: Along with China's economic development, we are ready to make greater contribution.

sentences.chinese: 如果有可能，我还愿来这里继续深造。

definition: to burn incense and worship Buddha
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
(of a childless couple) to pray for a son/to try to have a child
to burn incense at a temple
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
incense burning in front of a temple/burning joss sticks
to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
